Reduced violence: Children are generally less violent than adults, so a world ruled by children might have less conflict and violence.
More emphasis on education and play: Children would likely prioritize education and play, leading to a world that values learning and creativity.
Increased focus on sustainability: Children are often more environmentally conscious and might take steps to protect the planet and reduce waste.
Greater emphasis on social connections: Children are more likely to form strong social connections with their peers, leading to a more inclusive and supportive society.
More creativity and innovation: Children are often more curious and open to new ideas, leading to increased creativity and innovation in all areas of society.
